description:
The interview was recorded on August 25, 2003 with ʻAlī ʻAbdullāh Muḥammad, male, born in 1932? in al-Manṣūrah, Palestine. 

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع علي عبدالله محمد في 25 آب أغسطس عام 2003، ذكر، ولد عام 1932؟ في المنصورة، فلسطين.
contents: Childhood, agriculture and everyday life. (@ 0:00)||Wedding traditions, political turmoil, revolutionaries and military activity in al-Manṣūrah. (@ 15:40)||Village occupation, displacement and exile. (@ 30:59)
